wikipedia_page.main: Albert Curwood (31 December 1910 – 1971) was an English professional footballer. A centre forward, he was on the books of Blackpool Blackpool (having been transferred from Llanelli F.C where he started his football), Bournemouth & Boscombe Athletic , Swansea Town , Rochdale, Halifax Town and ending his career at Fleetwood Town. His grandson Steven Curwood is the Chief Executive at Fleetwood Town.
